description: {"blocks":[{"key":"a5qc","text":"Whole genome sequencing (WGS) is becoming an essential tool to characterize the genomes of avian reovirus (ARV), an emerging pathogen and growing threat to poultry producers and integrators. This protocol details a workflow for ARV  genome purification and amplification to increase the yield of ARV reads after next generation sequencing.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"1o5qg","text":"This protocol is per 6 x 106cells (2xT75 flasks at 95 % confluency) infected with approximately 20 μL of ARV supernatant and incubated (38°C, humidified, with 5% CO2) for 5 days, but it is scalable to larger or smaller cell lysates. Adjust volumes according to relative number of cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":27,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":164,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: avian reovirus (ARV), whole-genome sequencing (WGS), next-generation sequencing (NGS), virion purification, virion enrichment, ribosomal RNA depletion

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"einas","text":"We are going to use MagMAX™ Viral RNA Isolation Kit (Applied Biosystems, catalog number AM1939) to extract the RNA from the purified ARV virions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6p35f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9gi9o","text":"        NOTE: Spray work surfaces and pipettes with an RNase decontamination solution and wipe         clean.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":8,"length":87},{"style":"italic","offset":103,"length":6},{"style":"bold","offset":8,"length":87},{"style":"bold","offset":103,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"97v9g","text":"Preparing custom probes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fffpe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4psa8","text":"This part of the protocol was adapted from the original protocol detailed in Parris, D.J., H. Kariithi, and D.L. Suarez, Non-target RNA depletion strategy to improve sensitivity of next-generation sequencing for the detection of RNA viruses in poultry. J Vet Diagn Invest, 2022. 34(4):p. 638-645.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":279,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3f89h","text":"The sequence of the probes can be found in the manuscript.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"jjmg","text":"Dilute the probes to 100 µM stocks.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"29jjo","text":"Reverse Transcription","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9fr4u","text":"We are going to use SuperScript IV Reverse Transcriptase (ThermoFisher Scientific, catalog number 18090010) to perform the reverse transcription step.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"et4i6","text":"Preparing 50% Capto700 Slurry","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":29}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1n88o","text":"Spin CaptoCore700 resin at 800 x g for 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ra8q","text":"Remove as much supernatant as possible without disturbing the resin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bt41d","text":"Record the volume of resin left in the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"or43","text":"Add equal-to-resin volume of VDB and mix by vortexing. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f9jes","text":"Repeat steps 5.1 to 5.4.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ecoof","text":"Store as \"50% slurry in VDB\" at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"352da","text":"Virion purification","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6jtgo","text":"Centrifuge the infected cell lysates at 800 x g for 10 minutes to remove nuclei and debris.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bvdsu","text":"Collect the supernatant in a fresh tube containing 100 µl of 50% CaptoCore 700 Slurry.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5patm","text":"Mix sample end-over-end for 45 minutes at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2pk9e","text":"Subject sample to centrifugation at 800 x g for 10 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"50so5","text":"Transfer the top phase to a new tube containing 100 µl of 50% CaptoCore 700 Slurry.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6g6ta","text":"Repeat steps 6.2 to 6.5 for increasing purity.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4sh9v","text":"To clear all CaptoCore 700 resin, pass the supernatant of the last cleaning cycle through an Illustra MicroSpin column at 800 x g for 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8r0ii","text":"Store virus at 4ºC, or aliquot and store at -20ºC for long-term usage. Avoid freeze-thaw cycles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

Adjust volumes according to relative number of cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":27,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":164,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2jpdg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d531t","text":"List of reagents:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ip5c","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"m7q8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0":{"0":"C"},"1":{"0":"_"},"2":{"0":"5"},"A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold _dt-h-center"},"A_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_3":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_4":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_5":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold _dt-h-center"},"B_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_3":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_4":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_5":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"C_1":{"className":"_dt-bold _dt-h-center"},"C_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"C_3":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"C_4":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"C_5":{"className":"_dt-h-center"}},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":["177",100,100],"data":[["REAGENT","Per 1 L","[Final]"],["5 M NaCl\t","30 ml","150 mM "],["1 M MgCl2","15 ml","15 mM"],["100 mM Tris pH 7.4","1 ml ","10 mM"],["ddH2O","To 1L","\u0000"]],"guid":"45455930160E11EEA7646F5EBBF68541","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5eb86","text":"Filter-sterilize through standard 0.45µm bottle filter and store at room temperature","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["REAGENT","Per 1 L","[Final]"],["5 M NaCl\t","30 ml","150 mM "],["1 M MgCl2","15 ml","15 mM"],["100 mM Tris pH 7.4","1 ml ","10 mM"],["ddH2O","To 1L","\u0000"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"947l4","text":"The sequence of the probes can be found in Parris, D.J., H. Kariithi, and D.L. J Vet Diagn Invest, 2022. 34(4):p. 638-645.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":87,"length":131},{"style":"bold","offset":245,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aae7r","text":"Dilute the probes to 100uM stocks. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a3lbn","text":"For working master mix for the depletion\nprotocol, pool equal volumes (1 µL) of each probe.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":91}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"78s5i","text":"cDNA second strand synthesis\nWe are going to use Klenow polymerase (NEB,product number M0210S) to generate double-stranded (ds) cDNA.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"21e6k","text":"Spray work surfaces with Eliminase (or similar cleaner) and wipe clean.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aps28","text":"Combine the following on a reaction tube:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1gfto","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ecec2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["202",100],"data":[["Primer R8N (100 μM)\t","1 μl"],["10 mM dNTP mix","1 μl"],["Nuclease free H20","1 μl"]],"guid":"5CEFE1B0167A11EE8AF5556F58C4B9F2","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Primer R8N (100 μM)\t","1 μl"],["10 mM dNTP mix","1 μl"],["Nuclease free H20","1 μl"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"baea1","text":"Add 10 μl of the extracted RNA to the reaction tube for a final volume of 13 μl.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1vfpa","text":"Mix briefly by carefully pipetting up and down 10 times","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"77g4k","text":"Heat up the RNA-primer mix at 95ºC for 4 mins and incubate one ice for 1 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":30,"length":46}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3663i","text":"Prepare the SuperScript IV reaction (7 μl vol.):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b81cf","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fovim","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["292",100],"data":[["5x SS IV buffer","4 μl"],["100uM DTT","1 μl"],["Recomb.RNase inhibitor (40U/ μl)","1 μl"],["SS IV Reverse Transcriptase (200U/ μl)","1 μl"]],"guid":"E751E830167A11EE8AF5556F58C4B9F2","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["5x SS IV buffer","4 μl"],["100uM DTT","1 μl"],["Recomb.RNase inhibitor (40U/ μl)","1 μl"],["SS IV Reverse Transcriptase (200U/ μl)","1 μl"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9ubd9","text":"Mix briefly by carefully pipetting up and down 10 times","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d4ohg","text":"Add the SuperScript IV reaction (7 μl) to the RNA-primer mix (13 μl) and mix well by pipetting up and down 20 times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9st4l","text":"Incubate the 20 μl reaction in the thermocycler under the following conditions:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dg90q","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"34v0m","text":"NOTE: Use your first-strand cDNA immediately  to generate double-stranded cDNA or store at -20 ºC.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":98},{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":5},{"style":"italic","offset":6,"length":40},{"style":"italic","offset":79,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8mcqv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":[100,100],"data":[["23 ºC","10 min"],["55 ºC","10 min"],["80 ºC","10 min"],["4 ºC","∞"]],"guid":"DED6ED80167B11EE8AF5556F58C4B9F2","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["23 ºC","10 min"],["55 ºC","10 min"],["80 ºC","10 min"],["4 ºC","∞"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5upub","text":"Make a stock of primer R8N to 10 μM","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8q2je","text":"\n\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"29o84","text":"Add the following to the 20μl reverse transcriptase reaction:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aivo8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d5gu4","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c87eh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["215",100],"data":[["Primer R8N (10 μM)","1 μl"],["10 mM dNTP mix","1 μl"],["Klenow Rxn buffer","2 μl"]],"guid":"B76C06D0167C11EE8AF5556F58C4B9F2","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Primer R8N (10 μM)","1 μl"],["10 mM dNTP mix","1 μl"],["Klenow Rxn buffer","2 μl"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23]}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"kr4u","text":"Mix well by carefully pipetting up and down 20 times","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8l7r9","text":"Heat up the mix at 94ºC for 3 mins and cool down on at 4 ºC in the thermocycler","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":19,"length":60}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6nhn8","text":"Incubate samples at RT for 15 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":20,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ddsvq","text":"Place the plate on magnetic stand to separate the beads from the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"52ljq","text":"After 5 min (or when the solution is clear), carefully remove and discard the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d5ar","text":"Add 200 μl of 80% freshly prepared ethanol to the tube/ plate while in the magnetic stand. Incubate at RT for 30 seconds, and then carefully remove and discard the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":103,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8opt2","text":"Repeat Step 17.6. Place back on the magnet and remove traces of ethanol with a p10 pipette tip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ahrp5","text":"Air dry the beads for up to 5 min while the plate is on the magnetic stand with the lid open. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":22,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1n0bb","text":"Remove the plate from the magnetic stand and elute the RNA from the beads by adding 15 μl of nuclease-free H2O.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":108,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"flbhb","text":"Mix well by pipetting up and down 10 times. Incubate for 5 min. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b0ij1","text":"Place the plate on the magnetic stand for 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5p5g3","text":"Place the tube on ice and proceed with cDNA production. Alternatively, the sample can be stored at –80°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3ou93","text":"Mix by pipetting up and down 10 times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"755bn","text":"Fast-spin the sample to collect the liquid from the sides of the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"chj5h","text":"Transfer 12 μl of the clean host-depleted RNA to a new PCR tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6038d","text":"Now your ARV cDNAs are ready for genomic library preparation. Alternatively, they can be stored at-20 ºC","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":104},{"style":"italic","offset":98,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bs9c5","text":"Prepare Virus Dilution Buffer (VDB)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"an4j0","text":"Preparing cell lysates","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bneqr","text":"This part of the protocol was adapted from the original protocol detailed in James, K.T., et al., Novel High-throughput Approach for Purification of Infectious Virions.Sci Rep, 2016. 6: p. 36826. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":98,"length":70}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1v613","text":"This part of the protocol was adapted from the original protocol detailed in Chrzastek, K., H. Sellers, and D. Kapczynski, A universal, single primer amplification protocol (R-SPA) to perform whole genome sequencing of segmented dsRNA reoviruses. 2021, bioRxiv. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":123,"length":122}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"53ei2","text":"Prepare the Wash solution 1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fqqnr","text":"Add 12 mL 100% isopropanol to the bottle labeled Wash Solution 1 Concentrate and mix well. Mark the label to indicate that the isopropanol was added. Store at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bia8c","text":"Prepare the Wash solution 2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4qiia","text":"Add 44 mL 100% ethanol to the bottle labeled as Wash Solution 2 Concentrate and\nmix well. Mark the label to indicate that the ethanol was added. Store at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a27ab","text":"Prepare Bead Mix","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d2pjr","text":"Vortex the RNA Binding Beads at moderate speed to form a uniform suspension before pipetting. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5m8gq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a6h14","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eb75t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dgd99","text":" Include ~10% overage to cover pipetting error when preparing the Bead Mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cr4fh","text":"Mix thoroughly by gently vortexing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["266",100],"data":[["Component Per","1 reaction"],["RNA Binding Beads","10 µL"],["Lysis/Binding Enhancer","10 µL"]],"guid":"3E4FF89016C911EEACCABB4CB7630065","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Component Per","1 reaction"],["RNA Binding Beads","10 µL"],["Lysis/Binding Enhancer","10 µL"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23]}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9k58v","text":"RNA extraction","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"465vg","text":"Add 400 µL sample to 802 µL Lysis/Binding Solution in a 2ml microcentrifuge tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":21,"length":29}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eaamj","text":"IMPORTANT: When adding sample, immerse pipette tips slightly in the Lysis/Binding Solution to prevent creating aerosols that can lead to cross-contamination.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11},{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":157}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9b301","text":"Mix by gently  flicking the tube several times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6f6bl","text":"Centrifuge the mix briefly (~2 sec) to collect the contents at the bottom of the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a3lj4","text":"Vortex the Bead Mix at moderate speed to create a uniform suspension before pipetting","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1nad5","text":"Add 20 µL Bead Mix to each sample","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":3,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8b1d","text":"Gently shake the sample for 4 min on a vortex mixer to fully lyse viruses and bind RNA to the RNA Binding Beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"h88r","text":"Centrifuge the samples briefly (~2 sec) to collect tube contents.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"r4nm","text":"Move the samples to a magnetic stand to capture the RNA Binding Beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a311h","text":"Leave the tubes on the magnetic stand for 3 minutes or until a clear bead pellet is formed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"32tah","text":"Remove the Processing Tube from the magnetic stand.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e3chr","text":"Add 300 µL Wash Solution 1 to each sample and vortex at moderate speed for 30 sec.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":4,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"biv8v","text":"Centrifuge briefly (~2 sec) to collect tube contents.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cr0jj","text":"Leave the tubes on the magnetic stand for 5 minutes or until a clear bead pellet is formed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2hbd2","text":"Carefully aspirate and discard the supernatant without disturbing the beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1usu2","text":"Remove the Processing Tube from the magnetic stand.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ait51","text":"Repeat steps 12.12 -12.15 to wash a second time with 300 µL Wash Solution 1.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":53,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cac2r","text":"Add 450 µL Wash Solution 2 to each sample and vortex at moderate speed for 30 sec.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":4,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9a52a","text":"Centrifuge briefly (~2 sec) to collect tube contents.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cgbj8","text":"Leave the tubes on the magnetic stand for 5 minutes or until a clear bead pellet is formed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f47b0","text":"Carefully aspirate and discard the supernatant without disturbing the beads","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"40qqi","text":"Remove the Processing Tube from the magnetic stand. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8c1n1","text":"Repeat steps 12.18 -12.21 to wash a second time with 450 µL Wash Solution 2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f450l","text":"Leave the tube open on the magnetic stand at room temp for 2 min to allow any remaining alcohol from the second wash with Wash Solution 2 to evaporate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"em3tr","text":"Inspect the tubes and if there is residual solution, remove as much as possible with a very fine-tipped pipettor.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"154jf","text":"Leave the tube open on the bench for another minute.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b70q4","text":"Add 30 µL Elution Buffer (room temp) to each sample, and shake or vortex vigorously for 4 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cdfpg","text":"Leave the tubes on the magnetic stand for 5 minutes or until a clear bead pellet is formed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9n15t","text":"Transfer 26uL of the supernatant, which contains the RNA, to a nuclease-free container appropriate for your application, and store the purified RNA at –20°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4lobc","text":"Carefully aspirate and discard the supernatant without disturbing the beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Optimized conditions for whole genome sequencing of avian reoviruses.
